card.name: Chishiro, the Shattered Blade
card.property: Whenever an Aura or Equipment enters the battlefield under your control, create a 2/2 red Spirit creature token with menace. At the beginning of your end step, put a +1/+1 counter on each modified creature you control. (Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.)

card.name: Kotori, Pilot Prodigy
card.property: Vehicles you control have crew 2. At the beginning of combat on your turn, target artifact creature you control gains lifelink and vigilance until end of turn.

card.name: Myojin of Blooming Dawn
card.property: Myojin of Blooming Dawn enters the battlefield with an indestructible counter on it if you cast it from your hand. Remove an indestructible counter from Myojin of Blooming Dawn: Create a 1/1 colorless Spirit creature token for each permanent you control.

card.name: Yoshimaru, Ever Faithful
card.property: Whenever another legendary permanent enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Yoshimaru, Ever Faithful. Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

card.name: Myojin of Cryptic Dreams
card.property: Myojin of Cryptic Dreams enters the battlefield with an indestructible counter on it if you cast it from your hand. Remove an indestructible counter from Myojin of Cryptic Dreams: Copy target permanent spell you control three times. (The copies become tokens.)

card.name: Myojin of Grim Betrayal
card.property: Myojin of Grim Betrayal enters the battlefield with an indestructible counter on it if you cast it from your hand. Remove an indestructible counter from Myojin of Grim Betrayal: Put onto the battlefield under your control all creature cards in all graveyards that were put there from anywhere this turn.

card.name: Ruthless Technomancer
card.property: When Ruthless Technomancer enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice another creature you control. If you do, create a number of Treasure tokens equal to that creature's power. {2}{B}, Sacrifice X artifacts: Return target creature card with power X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. X can't be 0.

card.name: Myojin of Roaring Blades
card.property: Myojin of Roaring Blades enters the battlefield with an indestructible counter on it if you cast it from your hand. Remove an indestructible counter from Myojin of Roaring Blades: It deals 7 damage to each of up to three targets.

card.name: Go-Shintai of Life's Origin
Myojin of Towering Might
card.property: Myojin of Towering Might enters the battlefield with an indestructible counter on it if you cast it from your hand. Remove an indestructible counter from Myojin of Towering Might: Distribute eight +1/+1 counters among any number of target creatures you control. They gain trample until end of turn.

card.name: Myojin of Blooming Dawn
card.property: Myojin of Blooming Dawn enters the battlefield with an indestructible counter on it if you cast it from your hand. Remove an indestructible counter from Myojin of Blooming Dawn: Create a 1/1 colorless Spirit creature token for each permanent you control.
